builds.name: Twisting Blades
notes: Very high single target damage with 100% Vulnerable uptime and high mobility.
For clearing, use Shadow Imbuement instead of Poison.

builds.name: Rapid Fire
notes: High single target crit damage build with high burst and low cooldowns.
Try to buff your 3 combo point Rapid Fires with Poison Imbuement, Dash, Evade, and Shadow Step for strong burst.
For clearing, use Shadow Imbuement instead of Poison.

builds.name: Chain Lightning
notes: High single target damage and even higher survivability, but very mana hungry.
Maintain 100% uptime on Hydra while spending the rest of your mana on Chain Lightning.

builds.name: Firewall
notes: Build with high survivability that focuses solely on burn damage for Ashava.
Maintain 100% uptime on Hydra while spamming Firewalls.

builds.name: Upheaval
notes: A high damage build thanks to the synergy between Frenzy and Furious Upheaval, with lots of Health Regen via shouts.
Maintain stacks of Frenzy while weaving in buffed Upheaval casts. Alternate your shouts for high uptime on regen.

builds.name: Tornado
notes: A crit-focused Tornado build with high Vulnerability and Poison uptime and great defensive tools.
Very simple builder/spender playstyle with defensive cooldowns.

builds.name: Bone Spirit
notes: Single target focused minion-less build that deals high burst with Bone Spirit.
High essence generation via Decompose and Grim Harvest with Corpse Explosion
Before casting Bone Spirit, use Corpse Explosion for the Fueled by Death buff and channel Decompose for the 10% damage buff.

builds.name: Summoner
notes: This high CDR build constantly cycles through skills while dealing damage with summons, primarily Hydra.
This build will have near 100% uptime on Barriers thanks to Protection.

builds.name: Freeze
notes: This build revolves around automatic reactionary damage when freezing enemies.
For more AoE damage, replace Frost Bolt enchantment with Fireball.
For more single target damage, replace Blizzard with Inferno.

builds.name: Chain Lightning
notes: Speedclearing build with strong AoE damage using Chain Lightnings and enchanted Fireballs buffed by Barriers.

builds.name: Rapid Fire
notes: Very simple builder/spender build with combo points.

builds.name: Twisting Blades
notes: High mobility and crit build that uses primarily Twisting Blades for damage.
For survivability, replace Shadow Clone or Dash with Countering Dark Shroud.

builds.name: Thorns Bleed
notes: Most mobs will die from thorns and Flay. Deathblow and Rend are used for elites.

builds.name: Whirlwind
notes: Speedfarming build with high mobility and AoE damage.
100% uptime on shouts gives enough fury to sustain Whirlwind indefinitely.
Can move points from Swiftness to Ranks in War Cry.

builds.name: Upheaval
notes: This build is slower than whirlwind, but has a higher burst ceiling.
Use Kick before Upheaval against elites.
Can replace Kick and Wrath of the Berserker with Ground Stomp and Call of the Ancients.
Can move points from Swiftness to Ranks in War Cry.

builds.name: Blood Mist
notes: This build focuses on CDR to have 100% uptime on Blood Mist, which triggers Corpse Explosion and makes you Immune.

During the beta, Corpse Explosions from the Blood Mist legendary aspect did not scale with skill ranks. If this goes unchanged, move 4 points from Corpse Explosion to Bonded Essence and Death's Defense.

builds.name: Nature's Fury Summoner
notes: This high crit and cc build alternates between Storm Strike and Landslide casts while empowered minions do the rest.
For more survivability, replace Petrify with Earthern Bulwark and run Aspect of Mending Stone on chest or legs. You can then also pair it with Conceited Aspect.

builds.name: Leveling
notes: It might be worth running Hammer of the Ancients (Furious) over Upheaval when you unlock Aspect of Ancestral Force in Scosglen. This was out of the scope of the beta so we were not able to test it.
You can opt to run any of the shouts over Iron Skin for a less defensive option. Rallying for mobility and fury generation, Challenging for defense and thorns, or War Cry for damage.
We suggest unlocking and using the Codex Aspects above while leveling.

builds.name: Leveling
notes: At level 15, you'll notice a big powerspike when you unlock your 1st Enchantment Slot (Fireball). Change to Chain Lightning for bosses.
We suggest unlocking and using the Codex Aspects above while leveling.

builds.name: Leveling
notes: Between levels 13 and 25, you can change Concealment to Poison Trap when fighting bosses.
We suggest unlocking and using the Codex Aspects above while leveling.

builds.name: Leveling
notes: We take Tornado over Pulverize at level 4 to make the starter boss faster.
We suggest unlocking and using the Codex Aspects above while leveling.

builds.name: Leveling
notes: We suggest unlocking and using the Codex Aspects above while leveling.

summons.name: Skirmishers
description: Sword-wielding skeletal minions that deal 30% increased damage but have 15% reduced Life.
extra: You can raise one additional Skirmisher Warrior.
Each time you Critically Strike, your Skirmishers Warriors' next attack Critically Strikes and deals 50% bonus Critical Strike damage. Can only happen every 3 seconds.
Your Critical Strike Chance is increased by 5%, but you can no longer raise Skeletal Warriors.

summons.name: Defenders
description: Durable shield-bearers with 15% increased Life.
extra: Every 8 seconds your Skeletal Defenders negate the next instance of Direct Damage they would take.
Increase the amount of Thorns that Defender Warriors inherit from you from 30% to 50%.
You gain 15% Non-Physical Resistance, but you can no longer raise Skeletal Warriors.

summons.name: Reapers
description: Wields a powerful scythe that has a special wind-up attack, dealing heavy damage every 10 seconds.
extra: Reaper attacks against enemies who are Immobilized, Slowed, Stunned, or Vulnerable reduce the cooldown of their powerful wind-up attack by 2 seconds.
Reapers have a 15% chance to carve the flesh off enemies, forming a Corpse.
You deal 10% increased Shadow Damage, but you can no longer raise Skeletal Warriors.

summons.name: Shadow
description: Shadow Mages wield power from the beyond dealing moderate Shadow damage.
extra: Shadow Mage attacks have a 10% chance to Stun for 2 seconds. This cannot happen on the same enemy more than once every 5 seconds.
Shadow Mages fire an additional shadow bolt every 6th attack.
Your maximum Essence is increased by 15, but you can no longer raise Skeletal Mages.

summons.name: Cold
description: Cold Mages attacks will chill enemies eventually freezing them in their tracks.
extra: Each time your Cold Mages damage enemies with their primary attack, you gain 2 Essence.
Enemies who are Frozen by or damaged while Frozen by your Cold Mages' primary attack are made Vulnerable for 3 seconds.
You deal 15% increased damage to Vulnerable enemies, but you can no longer raise Skeletal Mages.

summons.name: Bone
description: Bone Mages use their own bodies as projectiles, dealing heavy damage at the cost of their own Life.
extra: Reduce the Life cost of your Bone Mages' attacks from 15% to 10%. After being alive for 5 seconds, Bone Mages deal 40% increased damage.

Each time a Bone Mage dies from its own
attack, they leave behind a Corpse and
Fortify you for 11% of your Base Life.
Your Overpower damage is increased by 30%, but you can no longer raise Skeletal Mages.

summons.name: Bone
description: A horrid protector that taunts enemies, forcing them to attack the Golem.
extra: Each time your Bone Golem takes up to 20% of its Maximum Life as damage, it sheds a Corpse.
Your Bone Golem gains 10% Maximum Life and the amount of Thorns they inherit from you is increased from 30% to 50%.
You gain 10% increased Attack Speed, but you lose the ability to summon a Golem.

summons.name: Blood
description: Drains Life from nearby enemies to heal and bolster itself.
extra: Your Blood Golem absorbs 15% of damage you would take.
While Healthy, your Blood Golem gains 25% Damage Reduction and 50% increased damage.
Your Maximum Life is increased by 10%, but you lose the ability to summon a Golem.

summons.name: Iron
description: An amalgamation of steel that slams the ground and Stuns enemies.
extra: Every 5th Iron Golem attack causes a shockwave, dealing 16% damage to the primary enemy and to enemies behind them.
Your Iron Golem's slam attack also makes enemies Vulnerable for 3 seconds.
You deal 30% increased Critical Strike Damage, but you lose the ability to summon a Golem.

uniques.name: 100,000 Steps
uniques.effect: After gaining the final damage bonus from the Walking Arsenal Key Passive, you automatically cast Ground Stomp and gain [32-50] Fury. This cannot happen more than once every 30 seconds.
uniques.flavor: "While many Barbarians remained in the Dreadlands, small groups from the Oxen, Crane and Bear tribes instead chose to search the land for a new home." - A History of the Children of Bul-Kathos

uniques.name: Ancients' Oath
uniques.effect: Steel Grasp launches 2 additional chains. Enemies hit by Steel Grasp are Slowed by [55-65%] for 3 seconds.
uniques.flavor: "Weapons wielded by the fiercest warriors often catch the eye of the Ancient spirits. If the wielder is worthy, the spirits may bless the steel with their strength." - Gerti, Oxen Tribe Forgemaster

uniques.name: Battle Trance
uniques.effect: Increase Frenzy's maximum stacks by 2 . While you have maximum Frenzy, your other Skills gain [10-20%] increased Attack Speed.
uniques.flavor: "The change that overtook my brother in battle was terrifying. His eyes turned hard like diamonds, and the way he moved... it was like he was dancing to music only he could hear." - Captain Dervin

uniques.name: Fields of Crimson
uniques.effect: While using this weapon, damaging at least one enemy with Rupture creates a blood pool that inflicts [X] Bleeding damage over 6 seconds. Enemies standing in the pool take 10% increased Bleed damage.
uniques.flavor: "We've been fighting these flesh-eaters for so long, been soaked in so much blood, that after a while it's difficult to tell what side you're truly on." - Daelyr, Crane Tribe warrior

uniques.name: Gohr's Devastating Grips
uniques.effect: Whirlwind explodes after it ends, dealing [50-70%] of the total Base damage dealt to surrounding enemies as Fire damage.
uniques.flavor: "The brutish construction of these gloves belies the strength they bestow. Gohr was clearly no craftsman, but it would be foolish to ignore the triumph of his work." - Barrett's Book of Implements

uniques.name: Hellhammer
uniques.effect: Upheaval ignites the ground Burning enemies for an additonal [X] damage over 3 seconds.
uniques.flavor: The demon prince Ikonoth slew hundreds of the Heavenly Host with this infernal hammer before falling to none other than the Archangel Imperius himself.

uniques.name: Overkill
terciary_stats: Critical Strike Chance Against Injured Enemies
uniques.effect: Death Blow creates a shockwave, dealing [16-30%] of its Base damage to enemies. Enemies who die to this effect also reset Death Blow's Cooldown.
uniques.flavor: The malformed snake creatures that live in the swamps are not content with simply killing their prey. They seem to take a malicious pleasure from inflicting as much suffering as possible before death.

uniques.name: Rage of Harrogath
terciary_stats: Physical Critical Strike Chance Against Elites
uniques.effect: Lucky Hit: Up to a [20-40%] chance to reduce the Cooldowns of your Non-Ultimate Skills by 1.5 seconds when you inflict Bleeding on Elites.
uniques.flavor: Harrogath, the final bastion of resistance against Baal's assault on Mt. Arreat was destroyed along with the Worldstone. The survivors never forgave the betrayal that led to the loss of their home.

uniques.name: Ramaladni's Magnum Opus
terciary_stats: Lucky Hit: Up to a 5% Chance to Restore Primary Resource
uniques.effect: Skills using this weapon deal [0.1-0.3%] increased damage per point of Fury you have, but you lose 2 Fury every second.
uniques.flavor: "Without him the wine is less sweet, the hearth less warm, and our blades less keen. Our blood brother is gone, but Bul-Kathos willing, we will meet again one day." - Sorrowsong for Ramaladni

uniques.name: Greatstaff of the Crone
uniques.effect: Claw is now a Storm Skill and also casts Storm Strike at [120-150%] normal damage.
uniques.flavor: "She has existed in Scosglen since before Fiacla-GÃ©ar walked the land. Her purpose is a mystery to us all. However, approach her with deference; she may grant you her counsel." - Airidah, to Donan

uniques.name: Hunter's Zenith
terciary_stats: Critical Strike Damage While in Werewolf Form
Overpower Damage While in Werebear Form
uniques.effect:
Gain a bonus when you kill with Shapeshifting Skill:

Werewolf: Your next Non-Ultimate Werebear Skill costs no Resource and has no Cooldown.

Werebear: Your next Werewolf Skill will Heal you for [X] when damage is first dealt.
uniques.flavor: "By fang, claw, spear, or sword - send the bastards back to the flames from which they crawled! Soak the peat with their blood! For Fiacla-GÃ©ar! For Scosglen!" - Nafain, during the Days of Ash

uniques.name: Insatiable Fury
uniques.effect: Werebear form is now your true form, and you gain +2 Ranks to all Werebear Skills.
uniques.flavor: When the Days of Ash began, the great druid Nafain reminded his disciples that nothing, not even the loss of their humanity, was too great a sacrifice to protect TÃºr DÃºlra from Astaroth's flames.

uniques.name: Mad Wolf's Glee
uniques.effect: Werewolf form is now your true form, and you gain +2 Ranks to all Werewolf Skills.
uniques.flavor: "He was not a victim of the curse - he sought it out. As his skin split and his bones cracked, his laughter never ceased." â€“ Tale of the Mad Nobleman

uniques.name: Storm's Companion
secondary_stats: Your Potion Also Briefly Grants Movement Speed
uniques.effect: Your Wolf Companions are infused with the power of the storm, dealing Lightning damage and gaining the Storm Howl ability.
uniques.flavor: "The storm's rage is my own, brother. I call, and the skies roar in reply." - Vasily, to Bul-Kathos

uniques.name: Tempest Roar
uniques.effect: Lucky Hit: Storm Skills have up to a [15-25%] chance to grant 4 Spirit. Your base Storm Skills are now also Werewolf Skills.
uniques.flavor: "Listen, child, to the music of the storm. It has its own rhythm. Its own melody. Hear how beautifully it sings, and perhaps one day you will be able to join in its harmony." â€“ Airidah

uniques.name: Vasily's Prayer
uniques.effect: Your Earth Skills are now also Werebear Skills and Fortify you for [X] .
uniques.flavor: "Roots from the Great Oak growing at the seaward statue of Vasily will, on rare occasions, be found twisted back upon themselves, suffused with ferocious magic." - Barrett's Book of Implements

uniques.name: Waxing Gibbous
uniques.effect: Gain Stealth for 2 seconds when killing enemies with Shred. Breaking Stealth with an attack grants Ambush which gaurantees Critical Strikes for [1.0-2.5] seconds.
uniques.flavor: The nights preceding the full moon are sometimes far more dangerous than the event itself. The frenzy has begun to rise, yet the night is just dark enough to obscure a hunter from their prey's sight.

uniques.name: Black River
uniques.effect: Corpse Explosion consumes up to 4 additonal Corpses around the initial Corpse, dealing [X%] increased damage and with a [X%] larger radius per additional Corpse.
uniques.flavor: "The scrolls describe a river of tar that separated the living from the land of the dead. Any unfortunate soul who tried to cross would be dragged down into oblivion." - Notes of Scholar Kamien

uniques.name: Blood Artisan's Cuirass
terciary_stats: Damage for X Seconds After Picking Up a Blood Orb (?)
uniques.effect: When you pick up [10-5] Blood Orbs, a free Bone Spirit is spawned, dealing bonus damage based on your current Life percent.
uniques.flavor: "The infamous Necromancer Gaza-Thul's mastery over blood magic was indisputable. Many suspect that upon his death, his skin was used to fashion this eldritch armor." - Barrett's Book of Implements

uniques.name: Bloodless Scream
uniques.effect:
Your Darkness Skills Chill enemies for up to 40% .

Lucky Hit: Your Darkness Skills have up to a 100% chance to generate [2-5] additional Essence against Frozen targets.
uniques.flavor: "My companion swung her odd weapon in a wide arc, and our pursuer stopped short. The look of horror on his face as his body fell to pieces will haunt me forever." - The Ebon Pages, Canto II, Verse XI

uniques.name: Deathless Visage
terciary_stats: Critical Strike Damage for Bone Skills
uniques.effect: Bone Spear leaves behind echoes as it travels that explode, dealing [X] damage.
uniques.flavor: "Rathma is endless. He was the first Ancient, and will remain at the end. He is the master of the Great Cycle of Being. When Death comes for him, why should he fear it?" - Vauntus, Acolyte of Rathma

uniques.name: Deathspeaker's Pendant
uniques.effect: Blood Surge casts a mini nova on your Minions, dealing [X] damage. Damage is increased by 10% per target drained by the initial cast, up to 50%.
uniques.flavor: Once a sanctum for Rathma's studies, the Temple of the Deathspeaker became a proving grounds for potential leaders of his priesthood. Its halls are filled with the corpses of those who failed.

uniques.name: Greaves of the Empty Tomb
terciary_stats: Damage Reduction From Enemies That Are Shadow DoT (?)
uniques.effect: Create desecrated ground beneath your Sever spectres as the travel, damaging enemies for [X] Shadow damage over 2 seconds.
uniques.flavor: "The massive door to my family's crypt, which had taken a dozen men to close, was thrown open. Had I known the horrors to come I never would have set foot inside!" -The Ebon Pages, Canto I, Verse VII

uniques.name: Howl from Below
uniques.effect: Instead of detonating immediately, Corpse Explosion summons a Volatile Skeleton that charges at a random enemy and explodes. Corpse Explosion's damage is increased by [30-40%] .
uniques.flavor: "Can you not hear it? That endless scream from the cold earth beneath your feet!? They are down there, trapped, blind with rage! Waiting to drag us down into the sod!" - Ravings of Madman Gustav

uniques.name: Ring of Mendeln
uniques.effect:
While you have 7 or more Minions you gain:

Lucky Hit: Up to a 10% chance to empower all of your Minions, causing the next attack from each to explode for [X] Physical damage.
uniques.flavor: The signet of Mendeln ul-Diomed, the founder of the Priests of Rathma and the first Necromancer, was lost for over 3,000 years. The immense power over death held within, however, has not diminished.

uniques.name: Asheara's Khanjar
terciary_stats: Damage for X seconds on Elite Kill
uniques.effect: Hits with this weapon increase your Attack Speed by [4-6%] for 4 seconds, up to [20-30%] .
uniques.flavor: When Caldeum's gates closed, Asheara led her Iron Wolves out of the city knowing full well they would never return. Instead they roamed Kehjistan pledging their blades to any who were in need.

uniques.name: Condemnation
terciary_stats: Critical Strike Chance Against Injured Enemies
uniques.effect: Your Core Skills deal [20-40%] increased damage when spending 3 Combo Points. Your Skills using this weapon have a 30% chance to generate 3 Combo Points.
uniques.flavor: "I've never seen such ruthless butchery. He deserves to be be shipped off to die in the swamps with the rest of the godless murderers." - Witness to the murder of Sergeant Walcot

uniques.name: Cowl of the Nameless
uniques.effect: You gain [15-25%] increased Lucky Hit Chance against Crowd Controlled enemies.
uniques.flavor: "He is banished from the Guild, his name stricken from the Book. His punishment is to never have been." - Excerpt from a burned parchment

uniques.name: Eyes in the Dark
secondary_stats: Your Potion Also Briefly Grants Movement Speed
uniques.effect: Unless it hits a Boss or Player, Death Trap will continue to re-arm itself until it kills an enemy. However, Death Trap's Cooldown is increased by [30-15%] .
uniques.flavor: "And so, when the sun dipped behind the hills each night, he knew that Ashen Jack would soon be near. Watching, and waiting." - Greenslade's Tales, Chapter 2: "Each Long Night"

uniques.name: Grasp of Shadow
uniques.effect: Lucky Hit: Damaging a Vulnerable enemy with a Marskman or Cutthroat Skill has up to a [20-30%] chance to summon a Shadow Clone that mimics your attack.
uniques.flavor: Dark wisps creep hungrily across these gloves, like an assassin's blade seeking a life to steal on a moonless night.

uniques.name: Skyhunter
uniques.effect: The first direct damage you deal to an enemy is a guaranteed Critical Strike. If you had maximum stacks of Precision Key Passive when you cast the Skill, gain [15-25] Energy, this can only happen once per cast.
uniques.flavor: "Genai took up her bow and aimed at the sun itself. The light burned her eyes, but her arrow flew true. Wounded, the sun hid, and brought forth the first night. - Fable of the Great Sky-Hunt

uniques.name: Windforce
uniques.effect: Lucky Hit: Hits with this weapon have up to a [10-20%] chance to deal double damage and Knock Back the target.
uniques.flavor: "There have been numerous world-shaping conflicts throughout history. This bow has been found on the battlefield of every one, and always in the hands of the victors." - Barrett's Book of Implements

uniques.name: Word of Hakan
terciary_stats: Critical Strike Damage for Imbued Skills
uniques.effect: Your Rain of Arrows is always Imbued with all Imbuements at once.
uniques.flavor: "Let the great gates of Caldeum be sealed. Let its proud walls stand fiercely defended. The rest of Kehjistan may suffer this plague, but my city, and my people, will not." - Proclamation of Hakan II

uniques.name: Esadora's Overflowing Cameo
uniques.effect: Upon collecting Crackling Energy, there's a 10% chance to release a lightning nova, dealing [X] Lightning Damage.
uniques.flavor: The only thing more potent than Esadora's magic was her endless hatred of humanity. As she lay dying, the pale amulet around her neck drank in both.

uniques.name: Esu's Heirloom
terciary_stats: Movement Speed for X seconds on Elite Kill
uniques.effect: Your Critical Strike Chance is increased by [15-25%] of your Movement Speed bonus.
uniques.flavor: "While scholars have proven these boots were not created by Esu herself, it is noteworthy that they have been passed down since the formation of the Mage Clans." - Barrett's Book of Implements

uniques.name: Flamescar
uniques.effect: While Channeling Incinerate, you periodically shoot embers that are attracted to enemies, each dealing [X] Fire damage.
uniques.flavor: The burn may heal, but the pain is eternal.

uniques.name: Gloves of the Illuminator
uniques.effect: Fireball now bounces as it travels, exploding each time it hits the ground, but it's explosion deals [75-65%] less damage.
uniques.flavor: After Inarius returned to Sanctuary, he sought a way back to the High Heavens. His first step was to reignite the religion he had abandoned millennia before: the Cathedral of Light.

uniques.name: Iceheart Brais
secondary_stats: Your Potion Also Restores X% Resource
uniques.effect: Enemies that die while Frozen, have a [11-20%] chance to unleash a Frost Nova.
uniques.flavor: The mad artisan saw his fingers turn black from frostbite as he worked the cloth, but refused to stay the needle and thread for even a moment.

uniques.name: Raiment of the Infinite
uniques.effect: After using Teleport, Close enemies are Pulled to you and Stunned for [2-3] seconds, but Teleport's cooldown is increased by 20%.
uniques.flavor: The power you have is never enough.

uniques.name: Staff of Endless Rage
uniques.effect: Every 3rd cast of Fireball launches 2 additional projectiles.
uniques.flavor: "Leaving even blackened bones for your kin to mourn is too good an end for you." - Josiah

uniques.name: Staff of Lam Esen
uniques.effect: Charged Bolts pierce, but deal [40-30%] less damage.
uniques.flavor: "Also known as the Greatstaff of the Old Religion, this powerful relic is one of only a small handful of Skatsimi artifacts that have survived to this day." - Barrett's Book of Implements

uniques.name: Andariel's Visage
uniques.effect: Lucky Hit: Up to a [15-20%] chance to trigger a poison nova that applies [X] Poisoning damage over 5 seconds to enemies in the area.
uniques.flavor: The horrific whispers of the Maiden of Anguish flicker through your mind, pushing you ever closer to madness...

uniques.name: Doombringer
uniques.effect: Lucky Hit: Up to a [15-25%] chance to deal [X] Shadow damage to surrounding enemies and reduce their damage done by 20% for 5 seconds.
uniques.flavor: Whenever this ancient sword has reappeared throughout history, it portends a time of great strife, as well as a devastating loss of life.

uniques.name: Fists of Fate
terciary_stats: Lucky Hit: Chance to Restore Primary Resource
uniques.effect: Your attacks randomly deal 1% to [200-300%] of their normal damage.
uniques.flavor: "Will you let fear cheat you, or will you risk everything to find understanding? After all, death is simply the coin with which we purchase life." - Zurke

uniques.name: Frostburn
terciary_stats: Lucky Hit: Chance to Restore Primary Resource
uniques.effect: Lucky Hit: Up to a [15-25%] chance to Freeze enemies for 2 seconds.
uniques.flavor: A touch so frigid it stops the heart and chills the very soul.

uniques.name: Harlequin Crest
uniques.effect: Gain [10.0-20.0%] Damage Reduction. In addition, gain +4 Ranks to all Skills.
uniques.flavor: "This headdress was once worn by an assassin disguised as a court mage. Her treachery was unveiled, but not before she used its magic to curse the king's entire lineage." - The Fall of House Aston

uniques.name: Melted Heart of Selig
uniques.effect: Gain +30% Maximum Resource. In addition, when you take damage, drain [3-6] Resource for every 1% of Life you would have lost instead.
uniques.flavor: "Do not allow your passions to become obsessions. Fuel the fire that burns within you, but it is madness to allow yourself to become ash to please an uncaring universe." - Last words of Master Selig

uniques.name: Mother's Embrace
uniques.effect: If a Core Skill hits 5 or more enemies, [20-40%] of the Resource is refunded.
uniques.flavor: "Every tome, every scroll, every book in this temple produces the same answer. The only being willing to stand against the Eternal Conflict, against the Prime Evils, was Lilith." - Elias

uniques.name: Penitent Greaves
uniques.effect: You leave behind a trail of frost that Chills enemies. You deal [7-10%] more damage to Chilled enemies.
uniques.flavor: Remorseful devotees of the Cathedral of Light must undertake a grueling pilgrimage, journeying across the frigid glacier known as the Serac Rapture. Only then may their gravest sins be forgiven.

uniques.name: Razorplate
uniques.effect: Gain [X] Thorns.
uniques.flavor: Crafted by the cannibal Armoda, each piece of this interlocking armor has been sharpened into a knife's edge. Even a century after death, the plate remained on her corpse, unable to be removed safely.

uniques.name: Ring of Starless Skies
uniques.effect: Each consecutive Core Skill cast reduces the Resource cost of your next Core Skill by [8-12%] up to a maximum of 40% .
uniques.flavor: "Yours is the power to pluck the stars from the heavens with the ease of a child gathering fruit from the bough." - Unknown

uniques.name: Temerity
secondary_stats: Your Potion Also Briefly Grants Movement Speed
uniques.effect: Effects that Heal you beyond 100% Life grant you a Barrier up to [40-80%] of your Maximum Life that lasts for 8 seconds.
uniques.flavor: "The revelation that master tailor Callas was in fact a witch only served to further fuel the desire for her uniquely enchanted legwraps." - Barrett's Book of Implements

uniques.name: The Butcher's Cleaver
terciary_stats: Critical Strike Chance Against Injured Enemies
uniques.effect: Lucky Hit: When you Critically Strike an enemy you have up to a 100% chance to Fear and Slow them by [40-75%] for 4 seconds.
uniques.flavor: A nightmarish amalgam of blood, bone and steel, this axe is as horrific, and as deadly, as its creator.

uniques.name: The Grandfather
uniques.effect: Increases your Critical Strike Damage by [60-100%] . The other properties of this weapon can roll higher than normal.
uniques.flavor: An unbroken lineage of unwavering strength.

paragons.name: Legendary Node
paragons.title: Blood Rage
paragons.description: Killing a Bleeding enemy has 10% chance to grant Berserking for 5 seconds.

paragons.name: Legendary Node
paragons.title: Bone Breaker
paragons.description: Overpowers with your Two-Handed Bludgeoning Weapon Stun enemies for 4 seconds and grant you 25% of your Maximum Life as Fortify.

paragons.name: Legendary Node
paragons.title: Carnage
paragons.description: While Berserking, Critical Strikes increase your Attack Speed by 2%, up to 10% for 6 seconds.

paragons.name: Legendary Node
paragons.title: Decimator
paragons.description: Lucky Hit: Two-Handed Slashing Weapon attacks have up to a 10% chance to make enemies Vulnerable for 2 seconds.

paragons.name: Legendary Node
paragons.title: Flawless Technique
paragons.description: Damaging enemies with One-Handed Weapons increases your Critical Strike chance by 1% for 2 seconds, up to 5%. This can only happen once per Skill cast, or twice per second while channeling Whirlwind.

paragons.name: Legendary Node
paragons.title: Hemorrhage
paragons.description: Enemies that have been affected by your Bleeding for 3 or more seconds take 15% increased damage from you.

paragons.name: Legendary Node
paragons.title: Warbringer
paragons.description: For every 75 Fury you spend, gain 20% of your Maximum Life as Fortify.

paragons.name: Legendary Node
paragons.title: Weapons Master
paragons.description: Swapping weapons grants you 3 Fury.

paragons.name: Legendary Node
paragons.title: Ancestral Guidance
paragons.description: After spending 75 Spirit, you deal 30% increased damage for 5 seconds.

paragons.name: Legendary Node
paragons.title: Constricting Tendrils
paragons.description: Lucky Hit: Nature Magic Skills have up to a 15% chance to entangle the enemy with vines, Immobilizing them for 2 seconds and Poisoning them for 120% of the Base damage dealt over 4 seconds.

paragons.name: Legendary Node
paragons.title: Earthen Devastation
paragons.description: Your Earth Skills deal 30% increased damage to enemies afflicted by Crowd Control.

paragons.name: Legendary Node
paragons.title: Heightened Malice
paragons.description: While there are 3 or more Poisoned enemies Nearby, you deal 45% increased damage.

paragons.name: Legendary Node
paragons.title: Inner Beast
paragons.description: After shapeshifting, your Spirit costs are reduced by 10% for 5 seconds, up to 30%.

paragons.name: Legendary Node
paragons.title: Lust for Carnage
paragons.description: Critical Strikes with Werewolf Skills restore 2 Spirit.

paragons.name: Legendary Node
paragons.title: Survival Instincts
paragons.description: While in Werebear form, you deal 1% increased damage, up to 50%, for every 1% difference in current Life percent between you and the enemy.

paragons.name: Legendary Node
paragons.title: Thunderstruck
paragons.description: Storm Skills deal 30% increased Critical Strike Damage against Vulnerable or Immobilized enemies.

paragons.name: Legendary Node
paragons.title: Blood Begets Blood
paragons.description: Blood Orbs grant 5% increased damage, up to 15%, for 5 seconds.

paragons.name: Legendary Node
paragons.title: Bloodbath
paragons.description: Attacks that are guaranteed to Overpower deal 50% increased Overpower damage.

paragons.name: Legendary Node
paragons.title: Bone Graft
paragons.description: Hitting enemies with Bone Skills increases your damage by 1% and your Maximum Essence by 3 for 8 seconds, stacks up to 7.5% increased damage and 22.5 Maximum Essence.

paragons.name: Legendary Node
paragons.title: Cult Leader
paragons.description: Your Minions deal 10% increased damage for each Minion type you have active. This only applies to the Minion types: Skeletal Warrior, Skeletal Mage, and Golem.

paragons.name: Legendary Node
paragons.title: Flesh-eater
paragons.description: Consuming 5 Corpses grants 40% increased damage for 6 seconds.

paragons.name: Legendary Node
paragons.title: Hulking Monstrosity
paragons.description: Your Golem has 30% increased Maximum Life and deals 30% increased damage.

paragons.name: Legendary Node
paragons.title: Scent of Death
paragons.description: With at least 2 Corpses Nearby, you gain 15% Damage Reduction. With no Corpses Nearby, you deal 15% increased damage.

paragons.name: Legendary Node
paragons.title: Wither
paragons.description: Your Shadow damage over time effects have a 5% chance to deal 50% bonus damage each time they deal damage. This chance is increased by 1% and bonus damage is increased by 2.5% for each 50 Willpower you have.

paragons.name: Legendary Node
paragons.title: Cheap Shot
paragons.description: You deal 5% increased damage for each Nearby enemy that is Crowd Controlled, up to 25%.

paragons.name: Legendary Node
paragons.title: Cunning Stratagem
paragons.description: Your non-damage Combo Point bonuses are increased by 33.33% when you spend 3 Combo Points.

paragons.name: Legendary Node
paragons.title: Deadly Ambush
paragons.description: You deal 22.5% increased Critical Strike Damage to enemies affected by your Trap Skills.

paragons.name: Legendary Node
paragons.title: Eldritch Bounty
paragons.description: When you attack with an Imbued Skill you gain 20% Resistance and 20% increased damage for that Imbuement's element for 6 seconds.

paragons.name: Legendary Node
paragons.title: Exploit Weakness
paragons.description: Whenever you deal damage to a Vulnerable enemy, they take 1% increased damage from you for 6 seconds, up to 15%.

paragons.name: Legendary Node
paragons.title: Leyrana's Instinct
paragons.description: When Inner Sight's gauge becomes full, you gain +100% Dodge Chance for 1.5 seconds.

paragons.name: Legendary Node
paragons.title: No Witnesses
paragons.description: Your Ultimate Skills deal 30% increased damage and grant you 10% increased damage for 20 seconds when cast.

paragons.name: Legendary Node
paragons.title: Tricks of the Trade
paragons.description: Your Marksman Skills grant your next Cutthroat Skill 25% increased damage. Your Cutthroat Skills grant your next Marksman Skill 25% increased damage.

paragons.name: Legendary Node
paragons.title: Burning Instinct
paragons.description: Your Burning damage is increased by 40% of your Critical Strike Damage, further increased by 5% for every 20 Intelligence you have.

paragons.name: Legendary Node
paragons.title: Ceaseless Conduit
paragons.description: Crackling Energy has a 25% chance to not consume a Charge when triggered. Crackling Energy's damage is increased by 2% per 20 total Intelligence you have.

paragons.name: Legendary Node
paragons.title: Elemental Summoner
paragons.description: Your Conjuration Skills have a 10% reduced Cooldown or Mana cost per Conjuration Skill you have equipped.

paragons.name: Legendary Node
paragons.title: Enchantment Master
paragons.description: Your Enchantments are 20% stronger.

paragons.name: Legendary Node
paragons.title: Frigid Fate
paragons.description: Dealing Cold Damage to Vulnerable enemies increases your Lucky Hit Chance by +1% for 5 seconds, up to +15%.

paragons.name: Legendary Node
paragons.title: Icefall
paragons.description: Killing a Frozen enemy grants you 15% of your Maximum Life as a Barrier for 5 seconds.

paragons.name: Legendary Node
paragons.title: Searing Heat
paragons.description: Casting Fireball or Meteor increases the Critical Strike Chance of further casts of that Skill by +5% for 5 seconds, up to +15%. Additional stacks do not refresh this timer.

paragons.name: Legendary Node
paragons.title: Static Surge
paragons.description: Stunning Close enemies restores 10 Mana.
